title: Bighorn Event
description: Schema that describes a Bighorn event.

trigger.description: The event trigger. For example, the DOM event.

type.description: The event type. An additional qualifier to help distinguish events.

host.description: The page or API endpoint (without querystring) where the event was triggered.

target.description: The page or API endpoint (without querystring) where traffic or data is being sent.

partner.description: The partner receiving traffic or data.

utm_source.description: The attributable source of the event (can be different than the visit).
